data.title: The 10 Spanish Basketball Stars in the NBA
data.meta_description: How many Spanish basketball players in the NBA have you heard of? In 1985 Fernando Martín was the first Spaniard to join an NBA team and the list of Spanish players that have succeeded in the world’s…
data.text:
How many Spanish basketball players in the NBA have you heard of? In 1985 Fernando Martín was the first Spaniard to join an NBA team and the list of Spanish players that have succeeded in the world’s most famous basketball league has skyrocketed since then.

Here are the 10 Spaniards playing in the NBA’s 2016/2017 season. This year there are two sets of brothers and 4 players making their debut.

1. Pau Gasol (San Antonio Spurs)

Position: Power forward / Center

Age: 36

Career History: FC Barcelona (1998–2001), Memphis Grizzlies (2001–2008), Los Angeles Lakers (2008–2014), Chicago Bulls (2014–2016), San Antonio Spurs (2016-present).

2. Marc Gasol (Memphis Grizzlies)

Position: Center

Age: 31

Career History: FC Barcelona (2003–2006), Akasvayu Girona (20016–2008), Memphis Grizzlies (2008-present).

3. Sergio Rodríguez (Philadelphia 76ers)

Position: Point guard

Age: 30

Career History: Estudiantes (2003–2006), Portland Trail Blazers (2006–2009), Sacramento Kings (2009–2010), New York Knicks (2010), Real Madrid (2010–2016), Philadelphia 76ers (2016–present).

4. Ricky Rubio (Minnesota Timberwolves)

Position: Point guard

Age: 26

Career History: DKV Joventut Badalona (2005–2009), FC Barcelona (2009–2011), Minnesota Timberwolves (2011-present).

5. Serge Ibaka (Orlando Magic)

Position: Power forward

Age: 27

Career History: CB L’Hospitalet (2007–2008), Ricoh Manresa (2008–2009), Oklahoma City Thunder (2009–2016), Real Madrid (2011), Orlando Magic (2016-present).

6. Nikola Mirotic (Chicago Bulls)

Position: Power forward

Age: 25

Career History: Real Madrid B (2008–2009), Palencia (2009–2010), Chicago Bulls (2014-present).

7. José Manuel Calderón (Los Angeles Lakers)

Position: Point guard

Age: 35

Career History: TAU Cerámica (1998–2005), Toronto Raptors (2005–2013), Detroit Pistons (2013), Dallas Mavericks (2013–2014), New York Knicks (2014–2016), Los Angeles Lakers (2016-present).

8. Álex Abrines (Oklahoma City Thunder)

Position: Shooting guard / Small forward

Age: 23

Career History: Unicaja (2011–2012), FC Barcelona (2012–2016), Oklahoma City Thunder (2016-present).

9. Willy Hernangómez (New York Knicks)

Position: Center

Age: 22

Career History: Real Madrid (2011–2016), New York Knicks (2016-present).

10. Juancho Hernangómez (Denver Nuggets)
